root.name: Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai!
root.description: Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai! or "Majikoi" as it is often abbreviated is a visual novel developed and published by Minato Soft. It focuses around the main character Naoe Yamato, nicknamed "the Tactician" for his quick wit and genius plans and his relationships with the Kazama Family, a group of mostly childhood friends.A version of the game was released on PlayStation 3. Titled "Maji de Watashi ni Koishinasai! R," this updated release includes new minigames and subtracts adult content to bring the CERO rating down to a console-acceptable level.
